data.caption: Corrigendum To The Extra-Ordinary General Meeting (EOGM) Notice Of Baazar Style Retail Limited (The Company) Circulated To Shareholders On January 22 2026
data.news_body: This is in continuation to the EOGM Notice of the Company dated January 20 2026 which has already been circulated to all the shareholders of the Company on the same day i.e. January 22 2026. A Corrigendum is being issued today to inform all the Shareholders to whom the Notice of Extra Ordinary General Meeting (EOGM) has been sent regarding changes in the Explanatory Statement. A copy of detailed Corrigendum is enclosed herewith and also would be uploaded on the website of the Company at https://stylebaazar.in/ .

data.caption: Extraordinary General Meeting (EOGM) Of Baazar Style Retail Limited Is Schedule To Be Held On Friday February 13 2026 At 12:00 Noon Indian Standard Time (IST).
data.news_body:
Notice is hereby given that the Extraordinary General Meeting (EOGM) of Baazar Style Retail Limited is schedule to be held on Friday February 13 2026 at 12:00 Noon Indian Standard Time (IST) through Video Conferencing/ Other Audio-Visual Means (VC/ OAVM) facility to transact the following business:
1. To consider and approve issue of fully convertible equity warrants on preferential basis to identified person and other matters related thereto.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Press Release / Media Release
data.news_body: Pursuant to the applicable provisions of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations 2015 we enclose herewith a Press Release titled Baazar Style Retail Limited to raise funds through Preferential Issue of Equity Warrants.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Preferential Issue
data.news_body: With reference to captioned subject we wish to inform you that the Board of Directors (the Board) of the Company at its meeting held today i.e. on January 20 2026 have inter-alia considered and approved: Pursuant to the expression of interest received from Cupid Limited the Board has given its approval for raising of funds through issuance of 10100000 (One Crore One Lakh Only) Equity warrants at an issue price of ? 328.25/- per equity warrant aggregating of ? 3315325000/- (Rupees Three Hundred and Thirty-one Crores Fifty-Three Lakhs and Twenty-five Thousand only) payable in cash on preferential basis (Preferential Issue) to Cupid Limited the proposed allotee convertible into equivalent number of fully paid equity shares of the Company having face value of ?5/- (Rupee five only) each in one or more tranches within a period of 18 months from the date of allotment of convertible warrants in accordance with Chapter V of the SEBI ICDR Regulations.

data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Outcome Of Board Meeting Of Baazar Style Retail Limited Held On January 20 2026 Pursuant To Regulation 30 Of The Securities And Exchange Board Of India (Listing Obligations And Disclosure Requirements) Regulations 2015
data.news_body:
With reference to captioned subject we wish to inform you that the Board of Directors (the Board) of the Company at its meeting held today i.e. on January 20 2026 have inter-alia considered and approved:

Pursuant to the expression of interest received from Cupid Limited the Board has given its approval for raising of funds through issuance of 10100000 (One Crore One Lakh Only) Equity warrants at an issue price of ? 328.25/- per equity warrant aggregating of ? 3315325000/- (Rupees Three Hundred and Thirty-one Crores Fifty-Three Lakhs and Twenty-five Thousand only) payable in cash on preferential basis (Preferential Issue) to Cupid Limited the proposed allotee.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Newspaper Publication
data.news_body: Pursuant to Regulation 47 read with Regulation 30 of the Securities and Exchange Board of India (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations 2015 we  hereby  enclose copies of newspaper publications in connection with Unaudited Standalone and Consolidated  Financial Results of the Company for the quarter ended on June 30 2025 published on Saturday August 02 2025 in Financial Express (All India edition) and Arthik Lipi (Kolkata edition).

data.caption: Intimation Under Regulation 8(2) Of The Securities And Exchange Board Of India (Prohibition Of Insider Trading) Regulations 2015
data.news_body: We hereby inform you that  the Board of Directors at it meeting held today i.e on August 1 2025 considered and approved the amendments to the Code of Practices and Procedures for Fair Disclosure of Unpublished Price Sensitive Information pursuant to Regulation 8 of the Securities and Exchange Board of India (Prohibition of Insider Trading) Regulations 2015 (as amended).

data.descriptor: Amendments to Memorandum & Articles of Association
data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Amendments to Memorandum & Articles of Association
data.news_body: Pursuant to Regulation 30 of Securities and Exchange Board of India (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations 2015 It is to be informed that The Board has given approval for alteration of the Article of Association of the Company subject to approval of Shareholders of the Company at the ensuing Annual General Meeting as enclosed.

data.caption: Intimation Of Closure Of A Retail Store Of The Company
data.news_body: Pursuant to Regulation 30 of the Securities and Exchange Board of India ( Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations 2015 this is to inform you that the Company has closed the operation of a store of Style Baazar at Samastipur Bihar today.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Change in Management
data.news_body: Pursuant to Regulation 30 of the Securities and Exchange Board of India (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations 2015 it is hereby informed that Mr. Alok Kumar Prakash has been appointed as an Assistant Vice President - Supply Chain Management a senior management personnel.

data.caption: Appointment Of Secretarial Auditors
data.news_body: Pursuant to Regulation 30 of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations 2015 Baazar Style Retail Limited has informed BSE about Appointment of Secretarial Auditors of the Company as enclosed.

data.caption: Board Meeting Intimation for Consideration And Approval Of The Unaudited Standalone And Consolidated Financial Results Of The Company For The Quarter Ended On June 30 2025
data.news_body: Baazar Style Retail Ltdhas informed BSE that the meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company is scheduled on 01/08/2025 inter alia to consider and approve Baazar Style Retail Ltd has informed BSE that the meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company is scheduled on 01/08/2025 inter alia to consider and approve and take on record the Unaudited Standalone and Consolidated Financial Results of the Company for the quarter ended on June 30 2025.

data.caption: Intimation Regarding Receipt Of Insurance Claim For Loss Of Capital Assets
data.news_body: Pursuant to the Regulation 30 of the Securities and Exchange Board of India (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations 2015 this is to inform you that the Company has received an insurance claim with respect to the loss of capital assets detail disclosure regarding the same has been enclosed herewith.

data.caption: Business Update At The End Of The First Quarter Of FY 2026 (Q1 FY26) Ended On June 30 2025.
data.news_body: We hereby enclose the Quarterly Business updates of the Company at the end of the First Quarter (Q1 FY 26) ended on June 30 2025.

data.caption: Intimation Of Closure Of A Retail Store Of The Company
data.news_body: Pursuant to Regulation 30 of the Securities and Exchange Board of India (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations 2015 this is to inform you that the Company has closed the operation of a store of Style Baazar at Angul Odisha today.

data.caption: Closure of Trading Window
data.news_body:
With reference to the intimation regarding the Closure of Trading Window submitted on June 25 2025 we wish to bring to your kind attention that the subject line of the said submission did not accurately reflect the nature of the communication i.e. "Closure of Trading Window" on the BSE Limited portal.
In order to ensure clarity and proper representation we are re-uploading the said intimation for your reference as enclosed.

data.caption: This Is To Inform You That Pursuant To The Securities And Exchange Board Of India (Prohibition Of Insider Trading) Regulations 2015 As Amended And In Terms Of The Companys Code Of Conduct For Prohibition Of Insider Trading The Trading Window For Dealing I
data.news_body: This is to inform you that pursuant to the Securities and  Exchange Board of India (Prohibition of Insider Trading) Regulations 2015 the Trading window for dealing in Securities of the Company will be closed for the purpose of declaration of Unaudited Standalone and Consolidated Financial Results of the Company for the Quarter 1 ended on June 30 2025 for all designated persons and their immediate relatives from Tuesday July 1 2025 till 48 hours after the declaration of Unaudited Standalone and Consolidated Financial Results of the Company to the Stock Exchanges.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Analyst / Investor Meet - Intimation
data.news_body: Pursuant to Regulation 30 of the Securities and Exchange Board of India (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations 2015 this is to inform you that the Company will be meeting Investors/Analysts the details of which are enclosed herewith.

data.caption: Reopening And Restoration Of Normal Operation Of Store At Dhuliyan West Bengal
data.news_body: In continuation to the Corporate Announcement submitted on April 15 2025 with respect to the temporary disruption of operation in one of the Companys store of Style Baazar at Dhuliyan West Bengal due to civil unrest this is to further inform you the Company has successfully re-opened the said store and restored normal operations.
